overview: I’m search engine optimization expert and the founder of Creative Web Systems. Born in Chennai, India, received a degree in Information Technology and moved to San Francisco to start my own company. I founded Creative Web Systems, a company specializing in web design,graphic design, copywriting and search engine optimization. Creative Web Systems is based in San Francisco, but I has also tapped into the highly-skilled and cost-effective labor market of India by establishing a satellite office in his home town of Chennai, India. Creative Web Systems provides innovative, customized and professional websites at an affordable cost. helping companies boost their search engine rankings and improve their visibility. My newest project is called Event With Me, a website and mobile phone app that links events, concerts, restaurants, nightclubs and other business listings and deals with Google Maps.
